Hawthorne.Fox Hills, Culver City, California:
Fox Hills is a neighborhood of Culver City, California, United States. It is roughly triangular in shape, bounded by West Slauson Avenue to the north, Inglewood on the south, the San Diego Freeway to the southwest, and Canterbury Drive to the southeast.

Fox Hills was annexed to Culver City in 1964, at which time it consisted of undeveloped land, riding stables, and golf courses.
